title: ASU Library Resource Organizer (Leganto)
text: Leganto is a course resource and citation management tool that gives students and instructors easy access to curated materials for their courses. Integrated with Canvas and the Ex Libris Alma® library services platform, Leganto enables users to seamlessly merge library resources within their Canvas modules, quizzes, discussion boards and more.
featureText: The ASU Library Resource Organizer is a comprehensive service integrated with Canvas, designed to facilitate the management and accessibility of course materials.

features.title: Adding, Editing, and Deleting Content
features.text: Easily add, edit, and delete various types of content including library resources, internet sources, and personal files.

features.title: Capture Internet Content with CITE IT
features.text: Provides a seamless way to incorporate open educational resources (OER) and other internet-based materials into course readings.

features.title: Stable Access to Content
features.text: Ensures stable access to content through library-licensed renewals/purchases. Reserve staff are available to support access to materials.
